display.title: Welcome!
display.description:
Welcome to Ozone Skyblock Reborn by MuggleOrWizard! If you have any questions or comments while playing this modpack, feel free to leave a comment on the project page, send me a message on Curseforge, or join the Discord server. 

If your starting island is in a biome that cannot spawn mobs (for example, Ocean or Badlands) or has a grass color you dislike (like desert), I would recommend you to create a new world. If you have remade the world multiple times with no luck, a forest spawn seed is: 643847447. You can also buy some passive mob spawn eggs at the coin shop.

If you are playing multiplayer, you can run the command /gog help to see how to make islands for each person. To make or join a team, click the teams icon in the upper left of your screen when your inventory is open. The quest book can be found there as well. 

&2Note: This pack is inspired by the 1.7.10 modpack "Project Ozone 2: Reloaded" by TheCazadorSniper. If you haven't played it before, I highly recommend you check it out - you can find it on the Curseforge app.&r 

&4For more of a challenge, try Expert mode! See the "Pack Mode" quest at the upper right hand side of the Alpha questline.&r

Some quest descriptions may use info taken or modified from the mod's respective project page, wiki, or in-game guidebook. All rights reserved to the mod and wiki authors. For more information on a mod, visit the Ozone Skyblock Reborn project page, scroll to the mod list, and click on the mod you want to learn about.
